title: Bitcoin’s Negative Correlation With Nasdaq Persists, and History Suggests a Bottom May Be Forming
contentSnippet: Historical patterns show that bitcoin often bottoms when its correlation with the Nasdaq 100 breaks down, a dynamic now appearing for the fourth time in five years.

title: Crypto Investor Donates $12M to UK's Reform Party
contentSnippet: Christopher Harborne has invested in stablecoin issuer Tether and crypto exchange Bitfinex, according to reports.

title: Ex-Signature Bank Execs Launch Blockchain-Powered Narrow Bank Backed by Paradigm, Winklevoss
contentSnippet: N3XT Bank, operating under a Wyoming charter, aims to provide programmable U.S. dollar payments around the clock without lending deposits.

title: TD Cowen Grows Bearish on $60 Billion Bitcoin Giant Strategy—Here's Why
contentSnippet: After Strategy established a $1.44 billion cash reserve and said it may need to sell Bitcoin, TD Cowen has lowed its MSTR price target.

title: Solana treasury Solmate stock rallies 11% after RockawayX merger announcement
contentSnippet: Solmate previously announced plans for an aggressive M&A strategy to bolster its treasury and staking operations.

title: Reform UK Gets Britain's Biggest Political Donation Ever From Tether Investor
contentSnippet: DigFinex shareholder Christopher Harborne donated $11.4 million to Reform UK, the largest ever gift to a UK political party by a living donor.

title: Sovereign Wealth Funds Were Buyers as Bitcoin Plunged: BlackRock's Larry Fink
contentSnippet: The CEO of the asset management giant, whose IBIT is the largest of the spot BTC ETFs, said the state actors were buying not for a trade, but to hold for years.

title: BNB Nears $910 as Volume Jumps 68%, Signaling Growing Interest Near Resistance Zone
contentSnippet: The token is trading in a sideways range, holding above recent lows near $896, while a breakout above $920-$928 resistance could push BNB toward $1,000.

title: Malaysia Cracks Down on Bitcoin Miners Behind $1.1B Electricity Theft
contentSnippet: A new taskforce is using drones and sensors to find power thieves, after 14,000 illicit mining operations have been uncovered over five years.

title: Meta Plans 30% Cut to Metaverse Budget as Reality Becomes Less Virtual: Bloomberg
contentSnippet: Horizon Worlds and Quest are facing layoffs as Meta retreats further from its $70 billion bet on virtual reality, people familiar with the matter told Bloomberg.

title: Meta weighs deep reductions to metaverse unit while sector’s crypto tokens collapse: report
contentSnippet: Metaverse-linked crypto assets have collapsed from early-2025 peaks, a sign that the virtual-world narrative has largely lost steam.

title: What Triggered Recent $4B Bitcoin ETF Outflows?
contentSnippet: Recent outflows from U.S.-listed spot bitcoin ETFs were driven by specific arbitrage trade closures, not widespread institutional panic.

title: BONK Edges Higher as Narrow-Range Trading Holds Above Key Support

title: ICP Rises as Cross-Chain Narratives Gain Attention

title: Kraken and Deutsche Borse strike partnership to link traditional and digital markets

title: BlackRock is RISK On! Polymarket launches US App! Crypto still Green!

title: Bitcoin Treasury Twenty One Set to Begin Trading on NYSE With $4 Billion BTC Stash
contentSnippet: Twenty One Capital is set to begin trading as XXI on the New York Stock Exchange on December 9, launching with $4 billion worth of Bitcoin.

title: ‘New Golden Age’: CFTC’s Pham announces regulated crypto spot trading has arrived
contentSnippet: Bitnomial has become the first exchange to list CFTC regulator-approved spot cryptocurrency products, the agency announced.

title: Blockdaemon, VerifiedX Join Forces to Deliver Mass-Market, Self-Custodial DeFi
contentSnippet: The experience, which is designed to feel like Venmo or Cash App, allows users to earn yield on bitcoin (BTC) and stablecoins and borrow against their holdings.

title: MoneyGram taps Fireblocks to handle stablecoin settlements for the remittance giant
contentSnippet: Fireblocks will provide "stablecoin infrastructure and a programmable settlement layer" to enhance "payment flows."

title: Crypto markets show ‘quiet strength’ as bitcoin exchange balances reach multi-year lows: analysts
contentSnippet: Analysts say improving liquidity conditions could set up a key test of resistance as Bitcoin consolidates above $90,000.

title: Ledger researchers flag Android chip flaw enabling full device takeover, exposing smartphone-based web3 wallets to physical attack
contentSnippet: The vulnerability requires physical access, but underscores risks for users who store private keys on their smartphones.

title: Aave deepens CoW integration with MEV-protected swaps and new intent-based flash loans
contentSnippet: The collaboration introduces the first flash loan product built for intent-based infrastructure, enabling more programmable liquidity uses.

title: Thailand Busts $8.6M Bitcoin Mining Operations Funding 'Chinese Scam Networks'

title: Solana ETFs See Record Outflow as 21Shares' TSOL Bleeds $42M
contentSnippet: Solana ETFs saw a record $32M outflow as 21Shares' fund bled $42M, contradicting a $321M on-chain capital influx to the network.

title: Police arrest two Ukrainian men after Vienna killing linked to crypto wallet theft
contentSnippet: A 21-year-old Ukrainian man was reportedly found dead in the back of a burned out Mercedes after being forced to surrender his crypto wallets.

title: No, Strategy is not going to sell its bitcoin, Bitwise CIO believes
contentSnippet: Bitwise CIO Matt Hougan said there is no mechanism that would force Strategy to sell its bitcoin, despite market concerns.

title: Bitcoin ATM Operator Coinme Ordered to Return Over $8M to Customers
contentSnippet: The Seattle-based Bitcoin ATM operator faces revocation of its license after allegedly claiming unredeemed customer vouchers as income.

title: Animoca eyes stablecoins, AI, DePIN as it expands focus in 2026: Exec
contentSnippet: Animoca Brands’ Keyvan Peymani says the Web3 gaming company is exploring all segments of the crypto industry, including DePIN, DeFi and AI.

title: Conor McGregor calls out Khabib over NFTs, gets shut down by ZachXBT
contentSnippet: The former UFC champion tried to launch his own celebrity memecoin, REAL, in April, but the project failed to gain traction.

title: Memecoin market sinks to 2025 low as $5B wiped out in a day
contentSnippet: Both memecoins and NFTs have plunged to their weakest levels since early 2025, with traders pulling back from speculative assets across the board.

title: NFT and memecoin markets recover after month-long crypto slump
contentSnippet: NFTs posted selective gains led by blue chips, while memecoins rallied broadly across major names in a sentiment-driven rebound.

title: NFTs hit the brakes: Market cap tanks 46% in just 30 days
contentSnippet: CoinGecko data shows the NFT market value has nearly halved in a month, with even top collections like BAYC and CryptoPunks losing ground.

title: Valve’s Counter-Strike 2 update crashes $5.8B economy, revives NFT debate
contentSnippet: A major update to Counter-Strike 2’s item mechanics wiped nearly $2 billion from its $5.8 billion skin market, igniting debate over central control in gaming.

title: Coinbase splashes $25M to revive a podcast from the last bull run
contentSnippet: Coinbase has paid $25 million for an NFT that compels the once popular crypto podcast UpOnly to restart. Bull market vibes anyone?

title: OpenSea rejects pivot from NFTs, says it’s evolving to ‘trade everything’
contentSnippet: OpenSea CEO Devin Finzer says the platform isn’t abandoning NFTs but expanding into a universal onchain trading hub.

title: Swiss regulator GESPA takes aim at FIFA’s NFT platform in formal complaint
contentSnippet: Switzerland’s nationwide gambling authority said user rewards on the platform feature the element of chance, categorizing them as gambling.

title: Fear returns to the crypto market as $230B vanishes overnight
contentSnippet: Investor sentiment turned sharply bearish as crypto’s fear index plunged to 28, and $230 billion in value evaporated in a single day.
